member.name: EMRFORMAT
member.summary: The EMRFORMAT structure contains information that identifies graphics data in an enhanced metafile. A GDICOMMENT_MULTIFORMATS enhanced metafile public comment contains an array of EMRFORMAT structures.

summary.para: Contains a picture format identifier. The following identifier values are defined.

listheader.description: The picture is in enhanced metafile format.
The picture is in encapsulated PostScript file format.

summary.para: Contains a picture version number. The following version number value is defined.

listheader.description: This is the version number of a level 1 encapsulated PostScript file.

member.name: EMRFORMAT.cbData
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the picture data.

member.name: EMRFORMAT.offData
member.summary: Specifies an offset to the picture data. The offset is figured from the start of the GDICOMMENT_MULTIFORMATS public comment within which this EMRFORMAT structure is embedded. The offset must be a DWORD offset.
